A space for Young People

Based in York & Scarborough, we help local churches provide excellent youth work

or

So how does it work?

We Come to You

Decked out with a café, consoles and craft areas, our mobile youth centre brings excellent youth work beyond the walls of your Church.

Reliable & Regular

Partnering with your church members, our skilled Youth Workers run weekly bespoke sessions that build lasting relationships with young people.

Trained Up

After working with your church, we leave your team fully skilled up and able to run their own Youth Groups.

So far we’ve worked with over

5000 young people

What the young people think

“The bus gives you a safe space to hang out and it feels like your second family. It’s been a place where I’ve explored faith and grown in my relationship with God.”
